name: Jumplix – Helix Ball Bounce 3D
description:
Jumplix is a simple challenging endless game. 

The game comes with simple intuitive controls. 

You have to slide your fingers to control the ball drop time and platform rotation. 

Avoid hitting the odd color platform and let the ball drop to the next platform to create a high score. 

Collect as many diamonds as you can, which can be used in the shop or to continue the game.

I hope you enjoying the game!
